title: High Stakes
description: As a son of a celebrated jeweler, Michael Aguirre was used to the frivolities of high society. But with his mother's passing and his father on his death bed, his affluent life is threatened. While out on bail from an estafa case, he ends up beaten black and blue by the man he owes millions to. With an impending deadline, he seeks the help of his sister who wants nothing to do with him, and his childhood friend who happens to be the son of the man who wants him dead. With these high stakes, will Mike come up with the money on time? The stakes are already high. Life and death. Can it get any higher?
author: Chris Nava
